name: House Always Wins
description:
House Always Wins is a game made for the GMTK 2022 game jam.

In this game you play as a casino owner that needs to throw away cheaters to avoid that your casino goes  to bankrupcy.

Hope you have fun playing.

Credits:

  • ZuelaBR - https://zuelabr.itch.io/
